name: Alter Ego Messiah
effect:
[ACT](VC)[1/turn]:[COST][Soul-Blast 1], and put up to a total of two cards with different card names from your drop zone on your (RC) as locked cards. (Locked cards cannot do anything. They are unlocked and turned face up as [Stand] at the end of their owner's turn)
[AUTO](VC):When it attacks, choose any number of any player's locked cards, unlock them, and all of those unlocked units get [Power] +10000 until end of turn.

name: Dragonic Overlord "The X"
effect:
[ACT](VC)[1/turn]:[COST][Soul-Blast 1], search your deck for up to one card with "Overlord" in its card name that is different from this unit's, put it into your soul, shuffle your deck, and this unit gets all of that card's card names and abilities until end of turn.
[CONT](VC):When your card effect would count the number of cards in your hand, it is regarded as zero.
[CONT](VC):If your opponent's vanguard is grade 3 or greater, this unit's drive cannot become 0 or less.

name: Dragonic Blademaster "Souen"
effect:
[CONT](VC):During your turn, if your opponent has no rear-guards, this unit and all of your Vision tokens get [Power] +10000.
[ACT](VC)[1/turn]:[COST][Discard two cards from your hand], call a Vision token to (RC), and at the end of that turn, retire that token. If "Wyvern Strike, Doha" and "Wyvern Strike, Garan" are on your (RC), retire all of your opponent's rear-guards. (Visions are grade 3/[Power] 13000/[Critical] 1, and can twin drive)

name: Supreme Heavenly Battle Deity, Susanoo
effect:
[AUTO](VC):When placed, look at two cards from the top of your deck, reveal up to one card from among them and put it on the top of your deck, and put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.
[ACT](VC)[1/turn]:[COST][Counter-Blast 1 & Soul-Blast 1], reveal two cards from the top of your deck and put them into your hand, and activate all of the trigger effects of the revealed cards. If your soul has a grade 3, reveal three cards instead of two. (Triggers resolve after this effect resolves)

name: Great Cosmic Hero, Grandgallop
effect:
[AUTO](VC):When it attacks, activate all of the effects below according to this unit's critical.
・2 or more - All of your front row rear-guards get [Power] +5000 until end of turn.
・3 or more - All of your front row rear-guards get [Power] +10000 until end of turn.
・4 or more - All of your front row rear-guards get [Critical] +1 until end of turn.
[ACT](VC)[1/turn]:[COST][Counter-Blast 1], and this unit gets [Critical] +1 until end of turn.

name: Goddess of the Sun, Amaterasu
effect:
[AUTO](Deck):When revealed by a card's effect, bind the top card of your deck, and one of your vanguards gets [Power] +10000/[Critical] +1 until end of turn.
[AUTO](VC/RC):When it attacks, [COST][discard a card from your hand], look at three cards from the top of your deck, reveal up to one normal unit from among them and put it into your hand, and put the rest on the top of your deck in any order.

name: Goddess of Running Water, Ichikishima
effect:
[AUTO](Deck):When revealed by a card's effect, bind the top card of your deck, and one of your vanguards gets [Power] +10000 until end of turn.
[AUTO](RC):When placed, look at the top card of your deck, put it on the top or bottom of your deck, and reveal the top card of your deck. If the revealed card is a normal unit, this unit gets [Power] +10000 until end of turn.

name: Divine Sword, Ame-no-Murakumo
effect:
[CONT](VC/RC):During your turn, if cards from your deck were revealed by a card's ability this turn, this unit gets [Power] +5000.
[AUTO](VC/RC):When placed from hand, look at five cards from the top of your deck, reveal up to one grade 3 from among them and put it into your hand, shuffle your deck, and if you put a card into your hand, discard a card from your hand.

name: Igniroad Dragon
effect:
[AUTO](VC/RC):When placed, look at seven cards from the top of your deck, reveal up to one "Dragonic Overlord "The X"" from among them and put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.
[AUTO](RC):When your vanguard attacks, if your hand has four or less cards, this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.

name: Heatshot Dragon
effect:
[AUTO](VC):When placed, [COST][discard a card from your hand], and draw a card.
[AUTO](RC):At the end of the battle it boosted a grade 3, if the unit it boosted is [Stand], [Stand] this unit.

effect:

[AUTO](VC/RC):When placed from hand, look at five cards from the top of your deck, reveal up to one grade 3 from among them and put it into your hand, shuffle your deck, and if you put a card into your hand, discard a card from your hand.

effect:
[ACT](VC)[1/turn]:[COST][Counter-Blast 1], and three units in your front row get [Power] +10000 until end of turn.

If your opponent's vanguard is grade 3 or greater, [COST][discard two cards from your hand], ride a grade 3 not named "Black-clad Top-tier Deity, Bradblack" from your hand as [Stand], and that unit gets [Power] +10000/drive -1 until end of turn.

effect:

name: Wyvern Strike, Doha
effect:
[AUTO](RC):When placed from hand, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], search your deck for up to one "Wyvern Strike, Garan", call it to (RC), and shuffle your deck.
[CONT](RC):During the battle it attacked, if your opponent has no rear-guards, your opponent cannot call normal units from hand to (GC).

name: Wyvern Strike, Garan
effect:
[CONT](RC):During your turn, if your opponent has no rear-guards, this unit gets [Power] +5000.
[AUTO](RC):When the attack it boosted "Wyvern Strike, Doha" hits, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], draw a card, and [Soul-Charge 1].

name: Wyvern Kid, Lagra
effect: [AUTO]:When rode upon, draw a card. Then, if your opponent's vanguard is grade 1 or greater, put a Quick Shield ticket into your hand.

name: Quick Shield
effect: One of your attacked units gets [Power] +5000 until end of that battle!

name: Weather Forecaster, Miss Mist
effect:
[CONT]:Sentinel
[AUTO](GC):When placed, [COST][discard a card from your hand], and one of your units cannot be hit until end of that battle.

effect: [AUTO]:When rode upon, draw a card. Then, if your opponent's vanguard is grade 1 or greater, put a Quick Shield ticket into your hand.

name: Quick Shield
effect: One of your attacked units gets [Power] +5000 until end of that battle!

effect:

name: Vision
effect:
(This represents a vision token, and cannot be put in a deck)
